UAObjectType.Description: Base Class for device specific data.

UAVariable.Description: Localized Name of our custom node inside the system
World Readable location information
The device manufacturer
A unique Model number that can be referenced for our testing setup

UAObjectType.Description: Base class for generic alarm properties and variables.

UAVariable.Description: Indicated an active Alarm for ActualLevel greater than AlarmThresholdMax
Indicated an active Alarm for ActualLevel less than AlarmThresholdMax
Controls the minimum FillLevel required to trigger a alarm on MinThreshold
Controls the maximum Filllevel required to trigger a alarm on MaxThreshold
Controls the enabled Alarm functionality for the device

UAObjectType.Description: Base class for publishing diagnostic information.

UAVariable.Description: Returns true if the device operates normal, Otherwise false
Returns true if the device is outside of operational range, reading > Maxlevel

UAObjectType.Description: A generic sensor that read a process value.

UAVariable.Description: Returns true if the Water Level is within operational Range (aka > MinLevel), Otherwise false

UAObjectType.Description: Base class for measurement functions of a water sensor.

UAObject.Description: FillLevel of the connected Tank in Percent. Returns between 0 and 1 based off configured FillLevel

UAVariable.Description: FillLevel of the connected Tank in the configured unit
FillLevel of the connected Tank in Percent. Returns between 0 and 1 based off configured FillLevel
defines a world readable string to how we represent the fill level (Percent)
Defines the minimum Level the Sensor is configured for
Defines the Maximum Level the Sensor is configured for

UAObjectType.Description: Base class for measurement functions of a water sensor.

UAObject.Description: FillLevel of the connected Tank in Percent. Returns between 0 and 1 based off configured FillLevel

UAVariable.Description: FillLevel of the connected Tank in the configured unit
FillLevel of the connected Tank in Percent. Returns between 0 and 1 based off configured FillLevel
Defines a world readable string to how we represent the fill level (Percent)
Defines the minimum Level the water tank is able to hold in units

UAObjectType.Description: A generic water sensor that can be attached to an industrial process

UAObject.Description: Generic device information and base parameters

UAVariable.Description: Localized Name of our custom node inside the system
World Readable location information
The device manufacturer
A unique Model number that can be referenced for our testing setup

UAVariable.Description: Returns true if the Water Level is within operational Range (aka > MinLevel), Otherwise false

UAObject.Description: Measurement functions and properties defined by the sensor

UAVariable.Description: FillLevel of the connected Tank in the configured unit
FillLevel of the connected Tank in Percent. Returns between 0 and 1 based off configured FillLevel
defines a world readable string to how we represent the fill level (Percent)
Defines the minimum Level the Sensor is configured for
Defines the Maximum Level the Sensor is configured for

UAVariable.Description: Returns true if the device operates normal, Otherwise false
Returns true if the device is outside of operational range, reading > Maxlevel

Indicated an active Alarm for ActualLevel less than AlarmThresholdMax
